definition[0]: the end of a period of time during which an official document can legally be used, or the end of a period of authority
example[0]: the formal expiry of the presidential term in September
example[1]: Only seven minutes remained before the expiry of the noon deadline.
definition[1]: when an official document, period of time, or right to buy shares, currency etc expires
